Item ID6573

Onyx gems are rare gems used in the Crafting skill. They are the second rarest gems in Old School RuneScape, behind the zenyte which is created from an onyx and a zenyte shard. Onyx can be cut from uncut onyx with level 67 Crafting by using a chisel, granting 167.5 experience. When used with a furnace and jewellery mould, they can be used to make onyx jewellery.

Onyx jewellery can be enchanted by casting the Lvl-6 Enchant spell on a piece of onyx jewellery, requiring level 87 Magic, 20 earth runes, 20 fire runes and 1 cosmic rune to cast, and granting 97 experience.

An onyx can be cut at level 73 Fletching to create 24 onyx bolt tips, yielding 9.4 Fletching experience and a loss of −1,835,461 coins.

Six of these are used to build a volcanic theme at level 85 Construction in a player's Superior Garden. In addition, one is used to build an obsidian decorative bench at level 98 Construction.
